name: Big Agnes Twistercane Bio Foam Hiking Pad
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: Made from sugarcane, this carbon-negative pad will have you dreaming sweet dreams. On warm nights the closed-cell foam is all you need to catch some Zzzzs. When the temperature drops, layer the TwisterCane under an inflatable sleeping pad for extra warmth and a cozy sleep.EVA foam contains more than 60% sustainably grown sugarcane resin.Sourced from farms that use Proforest® standards, audited by a third party.Smooth top surface, tire-tread bottom surface hugs uneven ground.Rolls tight for easy packing.
